snippet.title: Pocket Puyo~n ENG Translated
snippet.description:
Cutscenes from the Pocket Puyo~n for the game boy color, translated by Precise Museum! The story is set up slightly differently from the general Puyo Puyo~n, with a little more development given to Doppelganger Arle.

Many thanks to RubyCored for the footage and the bgm! Visit Precise Museum at @precisemuseum on twitter or www.precisemuseum.com for our other releases!

If you enjoy our translations, please consider donating to our translator! 
https://ko-fi.com/ingaluboi
